name: Game A Week - Week 4
description:
Surrounded by identical beings it's your task to find which of them is not like the others, In this game you must enter the room with all the bots and find which one is the Imposter. Luckily the Imposter will stand still when aimed at, use this and Find Them.

Controls:
  • W:- Move forward
  • A:- Strafe left
  • S:- Move backward
  • D:- Strafe Right
  • E:- Interact
  • Left Click:- Shoot weapon
  • Space:- Jump
Assets Used:
  • Sad Face Icon by The people from the Tango! project on Wikipedia
  • Happy Face Icon by The Oxford Scientist on The Oxford Scientist
  • Floor Texture by 3dJungle on 3DJungle
  • Wall Texture by 3dJungle on 3DJungle
